desc: A series of beautiful, engaging and educational books and related plush toys and accessories for young children, written and illustrated by Barbados artist Sue Trew. Learn about and care for our wonderful yet fragile environment.

layout.text:
A magical series of fun, fact-filled books, plush toys and accessories that cultivate curiosity, a love of learning and a desire in young children to care for the environment.
Created by Sue Trew
